description: Protect your tablet with this premium leather case from Manvex at all times! This case sports a simple and classy design custom made for your tablet, the outside of the case is made from a high quality PU leather material, while the interior is lined with non-scratch suede material so you won't need to worry about any damages or scratches to the screen.The cover is uniquely designed to transform the case into a multi-angle viewing stand, this capability allows the viewer to use the tablet hands-free whatever your position may be without strain. The case was custom designed for your tablet so all features of the tablet including the charging port and camera function (where applicable) are accessible even with the case on.The slim structure of the case offers convenient mobility so you can just grab your tablet and be ready to go, knowing it will be protected at all times!
title: Manvex Leather Folio Case for the Microsoft Surface RT / Surface 2 Tablet (does NOT fit the Surface Pro) **Includes FREE Stylus** - Black/Gray
